1.title: Snapped
1.plot: The CHIC's storm Taitiana's house to discover a bone-chilling sight. Meet the CHIC's and their family/friends connections.

2.title: Desperate Measures
2.plot: The Men of CHICs take it to the hoop. Lynette has a blind date that has been really pushed up by a colleague, however Taitiana has some information she needs to divulge. Saisha is throwing a signing party for her husband that comes with a few surprises of its own.

3.title: Delusions of the Mind
3.plot: The drama keeps building with Brian's inability to keep his word to Saisha. Taitiana attempts to find out what's really going on with Cleveland. She shares her concerns with Breè who stumbles upon some things that change the game.

4.title: Spiritual & Mental Attack
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: A Cry for Help
5.plot: Lynette comes back on the scene and shares her newfound love with Bruce. Taitiana tries to move forward after discovering Cleveland's secrets. Saisha seeks a listening ear from her closest friend as it relates to her tiring of Brian's neglect.

6.title: We Need You More
6.plot: Back at the church, Brian checks up on Devin. Krystal reached out to Taitiana to help Saisha. Tiffany disrespects Taitiana.

7.title: Do Me
7.plot: Brian continues with his absentee ballot marriage tactics. Lynette and Saisha work it out and catch up. CJ defies house rules after school.

8.title: Tell the Truth, In Love
8.plot: Taitiana invites the CHIC's to Pensacola for a much needed Women's Retreat. Daphne opens up and shares her pain. Devin and Brian discuss his troubles with Saisha. The CHIC's hit the beach, but the fun is short-lived due to more drama.

9.title: Playing with Fire
9.plot: Daphne invites Lynette out for drinks and to discuss the drama at the beach. Cleveland apologizes to Devin. Krystal helps Taitiana plan her benefit and Taitiana shares news with her and Bree that set the room on fire.

10.title: Hidden Truth
10.plot: The fellas attempt to intervene in Brian's marriage problems again. Taititana attempts to calm the storm raging with Krystal but is forced to face her own drama. A scandalous secret is revealed that changes the whole game.

11.title: When It All Falls Down
11.plot: Everyone is battling with their own demons in the Season 1 finale. CJ gets in trouble at school and is sent away to save the family relationship. Nicole demands more of Brian causing even more tension in the Simmons marriage. Cleveland gets sloppy and Taitiana snaps. Brian and Krystal's game gets sloppy and Bree's suspensions are confirmed.

imdb.plot outline: Season 1: Episode 1: "Snapped" The Chic's storm Taitiana's house to find her covered in blood and with a bloody knife in hand sitting on her bed starring in a daze with her husbands lifeless body next to her. This episode introduces us to the the Chic's individually and collectively.
